execution_plan.description: Get each user from the app database with their posts count.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS user_id, u.username, u.email, COUNT(p.id) AS posts_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN posts p ON p.user_id = u.id GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.email;

execution_plan.description: Get each user from the chat database with their messages count and full name.
execution_plan.query: SELECT u.id AS chat_user_id, u.username, u.full_name, COUNT(m.id) AS messages_count FROM users u LEFT JOIN messages m ON m.sended_by = u.id GROUP BY u.id, u.username, u.full_name;
